titleStmt.title: An harborovve for faithfull and trevve subiectes agaynst the late blowne blaste, concerninge the gouernme[n]t of vvemen. wherin be confuted all such reasons as a straunger of late made in that behalfe, with a breife exhortation to obedience. Anno. M.D.lix.
titleStmt.author: Aylmer, John, 1521-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: S.n.[i.e. London, printed by John Day],

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Knox, John. The first blast of the trumpet against the monstruous regiment of women.
The imprint is false; actual publication information from STC.
Running title reads: An harborovv for faithfull subiectes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
